item.title: Colin Jost Responds to Wife Scarlett Johansson’s Red Carpet Kisses With Jonathan Bailey: “People Really Blow It Out of Proportion”
item.description: The ‘SNL’ weekend update co-anchor and ‘Jurassic World Rebirth’ actress married in 2020.
